Uses of Class
se.softhouse.jargo.Usage

  • Packages that use Usage 
    Package Description
    se.softhouse.jargo
    An argument and options parser for java

    • Uses of Usage in se.softhouse.jargo

      Methods in se.softhouse.jargo that return Usage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Usage ArgumentException.getMessageAndUsage()
      Returns usage detailing how to use the CommandLineParser that caused this exception, prepended with an error message detailing the erroneous argument and, if applicable, a reference to the usage where the user can read about acceptable input.
      Usage ArgumentBuilder.usage()
      Returns a usage string for the argument that this builder builds.
      Usage Argument.usage()
      Returns the Usage for this argument.
      Usage CommandLineParser.usage()
      Returns a usage text describing all arguments this CommandLineParser handles.
